title: Good cleaning fun: housework down the years
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Household appliances

description: An education officer from the Museum of Victoria looks at a number of "labour saving appliances" used in the home over the last one hundred and fifty years and looks at the development of laundry and kitchen appliances.
